events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering based on your experience in software development and relevant skills.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the hiring process for the Software Engineer vacancy.
We conducted an initial screening call to discuss your background and technical experience, and you showed strong potential for the developer role.
Thank you for your prompt and thoughtful responses during the screening; you expressed keen interest in advancing to technical interviews.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 18th at 10 AM UTC, designed to assess your coding skills and problem-solving ability.
You successfully completed the technical interview where you demonstrated excellent knowledge in software design and algorithmic thinking.
An HR interview has been scheduled for you on May 21st at 3 PM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well; you showed strong alignment with company values and discussed your career goals in detail.
We have extended an offer for the Software Engineer position reflecting your skills, experience, and expected contributions to the team.
You provided positive feedback on the offer details and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering department.
You officially accepted the job offer, confirming your start date and excitement to begin your role as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has commenced, including access to all necessary tools, introductory meetings, and training sessions.
The hiring process is now complete, and you are officially part of the engineering team, ready to contribute to exciting projects ahead.
